input.sentences: the boy and his father arrived for the ceremony .
he got ready and worked on remembering what he needed to do .
he recited his verses for the ceremony .
after that he took his pictures with his proud father .
output.sentences: The yound boy studied the words for the ceremony.
The day finally came, and the boy performed as he had rehearsed.
The boy was given his scroll.
Hisfather was proud of his son.
